name: Ursua's Trodden Effigy
flavorText: Calling on the spirits of beasts made Desolate, she stifled the bleating Khazra host outside Viz-jun with a sloth of horrors.
flavorTextHtml: Calling on the spirits of beasts made Desolate, she stifled the bleating Khazra host outside Viz-jun with a sloth of horrors.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Zombie Charger deals 120% increased damage. The Zombie Bears rune now summons 8 bears that travel farther. (Witch Doctor Only) [100 - 150]%
